```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(CausalInvestData)
library(MatchIt)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Overview
`CausalInvestData` provides reproducible synthetic datasets for testing causal inference methods in investment management.

## Matching example (fund_performance)

```{r}
data(fund_performance)
m.out <- matchit(treatment ~ alpha + beta + market_return, data = fund_performance)
summary(m.out)
plot(m.out, type = "jitter")
```
